@BorisJohnson @pizzapilgrims Oh, Boris, you are so sweet ❤️❤️❤️on 4th July: COVID-19 Secure restaurants & plastic partitions, we can all enjoy meals confidently. You look beautiful, I like your long, blonde locks, don’t get a haircut. I have an appetite, not 4 food...U R a gorgeous blond Babe, I❤️U
